name: Don't let them through (Joseph Chhetri)
description:
You are task as a player is to kill the zombies before they reach the bottom and destroy the power source, that is holding this little world together.  I made this little game in vanilla javascript as a portfolia game. 

CONTROLS:-

UP / DOWN ARROW key to NAVIGATE

ENTER key to SELECT.

UP ARROW key to JUMP

LEFT / RIGHT ARROW key to move LEFT / RIGHT.

SPACEBAR key to SHOOT
